welcome.subtitle: Quality education for our students' future
welcome.description: Situated in Siguatepeque, Honduras. CEE is an Educational institution whose mission is to facilitate the formative processes, involving family, church, and the teachers, that allow for the transmission of information, morals, and values through an education founded in the Word of God. We provide Christ-centered education that shapes knowledge, character, and values through God's Word.
